title: Exercise: Use Parameters to Make Flexible Custom Transformers

questions.question: Creating a published user parameter within a custom transformer also causes any workspaces that contain the custom transformer to have that published user parameter.
Creating a published user parameter within a custom transformer turns that parameter into a parameter in the custom transformer parameter dialog.

Instead of creating a new attribute in the workspace (WeightedAttribute) and then exposing it in the custom transformer, we could have instead created an Attribute Name user parameter in the custom transformer directly.

Use an AttributeCreator to give WeightedAttribute a value of 0.5 instead of a random one. Using it as a weight, what was the PopulationDensity2001 in people/sq km of the Kitsilano neighborhood to the nearest whole number?
